      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String toString() 
      boolean validTurn(int[] start, int[] end, GameDefinition gameBoard)
      Using the chess rules of Queen this method ensures that whatever the inputed start position and end position correspond with the moves allowed for Queen Queen can move in the same moves as rook and bishop combined therefore we call on their check functions to see if they are allowed.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • validTurn

        public boolean validTurn(int[] start,
                         int[] end,
                         GameDefinition gameBoard)
        Using the chess rules of Queen this method ensures that whatever the inputed start position and end position correspond with the moves allowed for Queen Queen can move in the same moves as rook and bishop combined therefore we call on their check functions to see if they are allowed.
        Specified by:
        validTurn in class ChessPiece
        Parameters:
        start - array of the x and y values of current piece position
        end - array of the x and y values of destination of the piece
        gameBoard - current gameBoard with all the pieces
        Returns:
        true if the move is allowed
